function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Delays in authorization of clinical trials and studies by national regulatory bodies","Impact":"Slower development of medical solutions and treatments for COVID-19","Mitigation":"Establishing streamlined processes and communication channels with regulatory bodies","Technologies":"Digital collaboration platforms and electronic document submission systems","People":"Researchers, medical professionals","Owner":"Health organizations, regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Difficulties in engaging hospitals to participate in observational studies","Impact":"Limited data for research and analysis, hindering progress in understanding and addressing COVID-19","Mitigation":"Developing incentives and streamlined processes for hospital participation","Technologies":"Health data management systems, communication platforms","People":"Researchers, hospital administrators","Owner":"Health research organizations, hospitals"},{"Description":"General lack of consensus in the interpretation of the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR)","Impact":"Legal and ethical challenges in data sharing and protection, causing barriers to collaborative research","Mitigation":"Establishing clear guidelines and legal interpretations for GDPR compliance","Technologies":"Data encryption and anonymization tools, data sharing platforms","People":"Legal experts, data scientists, researchers","Owner":"Legal authorities, data management organizations"}]}
